1.content: You are preparing to go to the planet you were assigned to. It may have just started, but you can't to start crushing the droid armies. As you feel the Attack Cruiser accelerating a fellow trooper walks up to you he asks "hey what kind of trooper are you with that you reply...
1.title: Just the start....

choices: The same trooper from the ship
11.content: "I'm part of the marine task group. I'm suppose to go in first to disable those AA guns to make life easier for the convoy to flow through." The trooper puts on his helmet with an unknown insignia. "hmmph", he starts,"well ill be right there with ya pal!". You are about to question his insignia when he starts to walk away." Hey wait-" you cry out but you loose sight of him.Your commander runs past you yelling get to the ship, without a moments hesitation you grab your helmet and rifle and sprint after him. When you reached the gunship it speeds off knowing it has everyone. The ship rumbles as you fly though the atmosphere, you decide to glance out of the window when a laser blaster nails your left engine. You soon start to accelerate going down faster. starting to panic you grab on to the handle to hold your self up when a blast explodes knocking you out. As you come to a hand is reaching down for you. You gladly except the hand as they pull you up. after they pull you up you see it's
11.title: galatic marine

12.content: you awnser back saying "I am a commando of the 501st legion squad... which one are you in
12.title: clone commando

13.content:
"I'm a Scout" you proclaim proudly "What kind of trooper are you?"
the other trooper replies...
13.title: scout

choices: Bang his head against your scout ship
Get in your ship and take off
132.content:
"Aww...man! Here I thought I had found another Marine, instead I found some kind weak useless scout!" the marine tells you.
"What is that supossed to mean?" you respond angerly
Taking his helmet off the marine looks you in the eyes and tells you "The Scouts are just a bunch of useless wimps who can't even face an enemy like a real man. They're good for nothing but sneaking around and hidding."
What happens next?
You take off your helmet and...
132.title: I'm a Galatic Marine

choices: After a quick scan you return to the ship
Big mistake stumbled into droid army armed with anti- air batteries
1321.content: You throw a left hook to his jaw.As he staggers from the blow you angrily yell "Listen here asshole who risks their neck to make sure you get the damn intel you need to live down there?" he goes to throw a punch when his commanding officer walks up "Enough! Theta 126 shouldn't you be preparing for drop?" With a snuff he grumpily walks away. "and you" the officer changes attention to you "don't you have intel to gather?" With an obedient salute you climb into your scout ship and take off from the cruiser.
1321.title: Punch him in the face

1323.content:
As you climb into your ship.
The marine remarks that you and the scouts arent even real men that your just cowards, who should pick up a weapon and experience a real mans job.
what happens next?
you put your helmet on and ...
1323.title: Get in your ship and take off

14.content:
"Paratroopers, just waiting for jump orders."
The trooper replies " I know what you mean; how come we are in the second wave" the trooper asks in a complainative tone.
Annoyed you answer "because they're orders." Although you told this trooper what you are he didn't have the courtesy to tell you his role.
What is he?
14.title: paratrooper

choices: nothing special just a normal trooper
15.title: how about...

153.content:
"Hawk Squadron reporting as ordered, Sir!" As my squad and I stand in front of our CO Warthog, I can feel the Jedi up on the command deck probing my senses, and almost certainly the other members of my squadron. "At ease boys, you and Thorn Squadron will be clearing a path for the Larty's so they can make planet fall... is that clear?!" "Sir, yes Sir!" My squad and I yell back in unison. "Good, and don't worry Jedi Master's Plo Koon, Siesee Tiin, and Kit Fisto will be covering you, while Master Aayla Secura leads you down." "Is that clear?"

         Will you follow Hawk or Thorn Squadron?
153.title: nothing special just a normal trooper

info.brief_description: You are a clone pick your class of clone and pick your battles throughout star wars
info.description: You are a battle ready clone trooper. getting ready to go off to a battle pick the place your battle take place and try not to die! it should be fun just stick with it till the end who knows you might even get a battle fleet with your troopsat the end.
